reviewText: The couple you see on the cover are the only people you will see in the program, and after a while, it really does get boring; same pace, little action, and uninspired lighting, sets, and camera work.Also, don't even bother watching this in 3D.  I bought this mainly to check out the 3D quality, and I was miserably disappointed.  The 3D on this was NOT done in camera; no 3D camera was used.  It was all done in post and not very well; stereo separation frequently occurs vertically, which should never happen.  The result is like watching the film through warped glasses; the depth is all over the place, and often, the couple seem to be receding behind their background.  Your 3D TV's built in 2D to 3D simulation would probably do a better job.There's a stills gallery, which is just frames taken from the film.  Nothing new or different, and nothing you won't see by pausing the video.Other than that, the video & audio are ok.  The content could have been better and more interesting.  For $12, it's ok.  But if that's what what they're going to do for 3D for the rest of the series, they shouldn't even bother.  Shoot it in 3D or skip the 3D altogether.

reviewText: I have a woman friend (I am a guy) who is not my girlfriend and we are always giving each other goofy gifts.  So when she bought a 3D TV, I bought this for her as a gag gift as she said her current BF was not cutting it in bed.  She laughed her head off when she opened it.  But a few weeks later she told me it was not that good.  So she screened maybe 1/2 of it for me.  This 3D movie was not sexy at all to me (or her) at all.  Other people have different tastes, so I am not sure what to say about it.  This move is extremely "stylized" and I could never get into the mood with it playing in the background.  But that is just me and her.  Your mileage may very.

reviewText: First, let me state, if you are looking for some hardcore action, this is not for you.It is however something you can watch with your Wife or Girlfriend and they may actually enjoy it. It is basically a pretty hot woman, with a pretty average guy going through the motions of Foreplay and simulated Sex acts while listening to some slow Chill out music. A Woman narrator chimes in every so often to explain things.As for the 3D, it's so so. Not a lot of depth.Bottom line, stay away if your looking for action. But at around $12 or so, you could do worse.Do not take this as a recommendation, if I'd never got it, I certainly wouldn't have missed it.
